/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise serene landscape. In the distance, a few buildings peek through the foliage, hinting at the urban environment beyond. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, taking in the view.
